data.name: Absorb Vitality
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A curse which siphons away your enemy's life, dealing X corporeal damage over 15 seconds and healing you for all of the damage dealt by this DoT. Hand of Rhuin and Artic Blast will deal an additional Y corporeal damage to the target.

data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Gain a 300 unique bonus to spiritual resistance and a 170 unique bonus to corporeal and elemental resistance.

data.name: Arctic Blast
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You send a blast of dark energy slamming into your target, dealing X spiritual damage.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 20% health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Black Horror
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You create a maelstrom of evil power which deals X corporeal damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them, and they take a X ability penalty to initiative for 20 seconds.

data.name: Chilling Gusts
data.description: Each time Ice Spikes damages an enemy, it has a 50% chance proc a Frozen Touch and a 12.5% chance to proc it twice. (And a 37.5% chance to not proc it at all)

data.name: Chillwind
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A curse which deals X corporeal damage to your target over 9 seconds.

data.name: Close Quarters
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Crippling Terror
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them are silenced and disarmed for 7 seconds, making them unable to use melee, ranged, or magic abilities.

data.name: Daemonic Chill
data.description: Everyone in your group that is within 100 feet of you is surrounded by a demonic chill for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal X corporeal damage back against the attacker when they are struck by a melee attack.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Darkstar Cloak
data.description: None of your abilities will consume action points for 10 seconds.

data.name: Devour Energy
data.description: Whenever one of your spells hits an enemy, you have a 25% chance to regain 30 action points. This effect can not occur more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Dhar Wind
data.note: Consumes 20 Dark Magic
data.description: You expel some of your build-up Dark Magic in a deadly blast, dealing X corporeal damage

data.name: Dire Blast
data.description: Deals 600 damage to your target immediately, and another 1206 damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Disastrous Cascade
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You allow dark powers for flow freely through your body for up to 3 seconds, dealing X spiritual damage every second to all enemies within 30 feet. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Doombolt
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A massive burst of dark power which deals X corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Dread Aspect
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Echo of Power
data.note:
Requires Disrupt
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: An instant blast of magic that deals X corporeal damage to your target and can not be defended against.

data.name: Empowered Dhar
data.description: Dhar Wind will now increase your damage by 10% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Endless Knowledge
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to intelligence.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Frostbite
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You fill your enemy's mind with fear, dealing X corporeal damage and disarming them for 3 seconds, making them unable to use melee and ranged abilities.

data.name: Frozen Touch
data.description: Everyone in your group that is within 100 feet of you is filled with dark energy for 1 hour, giving them a 25% chance to deal an additional X corporeal damage any time they deal damage.

data.name: Gloom of Night
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A cloud of gloom clings to your target for 15 seconds, dealing X spiritual damage every 3 seconds to them and all other enemies within 20 feet of them. You will gain 3 Dark Magic whenever this deals damage to an enemy.

data.name: Gloomburst
data.note:
Builds 25 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A quick-casting spell that deals X corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Glorious Carnage
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy with a direct damage ability, you will gain 200 points of morale. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Grasping Darkness
data.description: Doombolt and Chillwind will now also cause the victim to lose 20 action points, and will cause the target to take a X penalty to strength, ballistic skill, and intelligence for 10 seconds.

data.name: Grip of Fear
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet become rooted, making them unable to move for 10 seconds.  Rooted targets have a 50% chance to break free when they suffer damage.

data.name: Hand of Ruin
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Tendrils of dark energy burst forth from your hand and slice into your target for up to 6 seconds, dealing X spiritual damage every 2 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Hastened Fear
data.description: Reduces the cooldown times of Dread Aspect and Grip Of Fear by 7 seconds.

data.name: Ice Spikes
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You cause dark energy to burst out of the ground, inflicting a curse upon all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away, which deals X corporeal damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Impending Doom
data.note:
Builds 40 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You draw forth a huge amount of Dark Magic and slam your target with a powerful blast of force, dealing X corporeal damage.

data.name: Infernal Gift
data.description: Whenever one of your damaging spells hits an enemy, there is a 25% chance that your other groupmates within 100 feet of you will gain an Infernal Gift, increasing all damage that they deal by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Infernal Wave
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A cone of dark energy bursts forth in front of you, dealing X spiritual damage to enemies up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Lengthening Shadows
data.description: Increases the radius of Surging Pain and the distance of Infernal Wave by 33%.

data.name: Mage Bolt
data.description: A focused blast that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Manic Obsession
data.description: Reduces Obsessive Focus's cooldown time by 40 seconds.

data.name: Misdirection
data.description: You gain a strong counter aura for the next 10 seconds that will reduce half of any incoming magic damage and redirect half of any direct damage back to the caster.

data.name: Neverending Agony
data.description: Reduces Infernal Wave's cooldown time by 5 seconds, and Pit Of Shades's cooldown time by 10 seconds.

data.name: Obsessive Focus
data.description: You become obsessed with your target for 20 seconds, dealing 10% more damage to them, but 90% damage to everyone else. Even if the target dies, your obsession will persist for the full duration.

data.name: Paralyzing Nightmares
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet suffer 1200 damage and become rooted, making them unable to move for 7 seconds.

data.name: Piercing Shadows
data.description: Any time that your Dark Magic causes a backlash, the blast will also deal 50% of the damage to all enemies within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Pit of Shades
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A 20 feet pit of shadow covers the ground at a point that you select for 9 seconds. Your enemies will suffer X spiritual damage every 1.5 seconds while they are within the area. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Reckless Gathering
data.note: Costs 40 Dark Magic
data.description: You instantly regain 160 action points.

data.name: Gloom and Doom
data.description: Gloomburst will not go on cooldown when cast. If another gloomburst is cast within 5 seconds, Gloomburst will go on cooldown for 10 seconds.

data.name: Scintillating Energy
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to your target, and staggers them for 9 seconds, preventing all actions until they take damage.

data.name: Shades of Death
data.note: Costs 40 Dark Magic
data.description: Deals X corporeal damage to target. For the next 10 seconds, your Path of Agony abilities will hit the target again a short time later for less damage.

data.name: Shadow Knives
data.note:
Builds 15 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You create a cloud of dark energy for up to 6 seconds, dealing X corporeal damage to your target and all enemies within 20 feet of them every 2 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Shadow of Disaster
data.description: The ap cost of Chillwind is reduced by 20 and it will cause the target to take a X tactic penalty to spiritual resistance for 9 seconds.

data.name: Shattered Shadows
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: You crush your foes underneath a blast of living shadow, dealing X spiritual damage to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Shroud of Darkness
data.description: You draw the shadows close to you, gaining a X ability bonus to all resistance for 20 seconds.

data.name: Siphon Power
data.description: Steals up to 200 action points from your target and gives it to you, and causes your target to take a 160 morale penalty to intelligence for 30 seconds.

data.name: Sleight of Hand
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 50% less than normal.

data.name: Soul Stealer
data.description: Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them suffer 800 damage and lose 125 Action Points. You gain 800 health and 125 Action Points.

data.name: Stricken Voices
data.note:
Builds 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Your enemy becomes overwhelmed with panic, suffering X corporeal damage. Fear and uncertainty spread rapidly through the enemy ranks, silencing the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them for 3 seconds.

data.name: Surging Pain
data.note:
Costs 20 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Waves of agony roll outwards from you, dealing X corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Swell of Doom
data.description: Doombolt and Artic Blast will have a 1.0s faster cast time whenever you are at less than 90 Dark Magic. Echo of Power will cause the next Doombolt cast within 5 seconds to ignore 33% corporeal resistance.

data.name: Tapping The Dark
data.description: Whenever your Frozen Touch effect triggers for one of your allies, they will become surrounded by a protective barrier for up to 5 seconds which will absorb up to 250 damage.

data.name: Triumphant Blasting
data.description: Any time you critically hit with a Path Of Destruction ability, the victim will be knocked backwards a moderate distance and mobs will be knocked down.

data.name: Unleash the Winds
data.description: Deals 1800 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and knocks them away from you.

data.name: Vision of Domination
data.description: Word of Pain's willpower debuff is increased to X for 5 seconds and will deal Y spiritual damage at the end of the debuff duration.

data.name: Vision of Torment
data.note:
Builds 10 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: A curse which causes the enemy to lose 30 action points over 5 seconds. When this effect ends, they will suffer X spiritual damage.

data.name: Wind-Woven Shell
data.description: Each groupmember within 100 feet takes only 80% damage for 20 seconds.

data.name: Word of Pain
data.note:
Builds 5 Dark Magic
Has a chance to cause a Backlash!
data.description: Causes your target to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to willpower for 10 seconds. When the effect ends, the victim will suffer X spiritual damage.

data.name: Dark Magic
data.note: Builds up to 100. Rests at 0.
data.description:
1-10: +4% magic crit, +10% crit damage, 4% chance of backlash.
11-30: +8% magic crit, +20% crit damage, 8% chance of backlash.
31-70: +15% magic crit, +40% crit damage, 15% chance of backlash.
71-90: +25% magic crit, +80% crit damage, 25% chance of backlash.
1-10: +35% magic crit, +100% crit damage, 35% chance of backlash.

Backlashes deal (40/300 + 0.5INT) corporeal damage to the caster and can critically hit.
